message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar for less. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the quality of this product is truly exceptional and I can't go that low. How about we meet in the middle at $150?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to keep my expenses down. Could we negotiate at $140?
